name: .PXJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .PXJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Disc authoring project created with Sonic RecordNow, a CD/DVD burning program; used for creating data discs, as well as audio CDs and video DVDs; files can be organized by the user and then burned to a disc.

content: NOTE: After Sonic RecordNow 8, the program transitioned to Roxio RecordNow 8 Premier. It is now RecordNow Music Lab.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
